title: Stevie Ross
text:
Stephen Ross (born 27 January 1965) is a Scottish retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who made over 360 appearances in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a>, most notably for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>. He also played for <a href="Stranraer%20F.C.">Stranraer</a>, <a href="Clyde%20F.C.">Clyde</a>, <a href="Albion%20Rovers%20F.C.">Albion Rovers</a>, <a href="Partick%20Thistle%20F.C.">Partick Thistle</a> and <a href="Clydebank%20F.C.%20%281965%29">Clydebank</a>.
Honours.
Stranraer
